Text.val: 22.03.2011 GB SCR16256 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
01.09.2008 SH SCR13915 Replaced LimitsAndConc client fields by Limit fields

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAFACTORING + ACCC_MUTARETENTION) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':4' and ACCC_MUTTYPE in (97, 98, 99) for fetch only
select cast(sum(CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMCD where CMCD_ADMNO = :2 and CMCD_CLNTNO = :3 and CMCD_MARKCODE = ':4' for fetch only
